title: River Styx Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to grant an Underworld member Basic defense for the night and douse anyone who attacks them tonight.
- Use 2 bees to redirect a player to another player of your choice. If that player also visits your first target, douse both.
- Use 3 bees to douse all non-Underworld players who visit either of two players of your choice.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 2729
*They will be given over to everlasting bzzzz.*
